level.introtext: Let's check out another kind of variable!
level.endtext: Now you know all about variables!
level.code:
BOOLEAN variables store either TRUE or FALSE. coding_rocks = True You can use variables in expressions to create new variables: bool coding_is_awesome = coding_rocks; You can also use a variable to redefine itself! current_year = 2019 How will we change the current_year for next year? current_year = current_year + 1
High school math is useless for programming. Order of operations is still true for Python programs!
the * symbol means multiplication and / means division math = 1+3/(4-1)
